text:
Dragons Clusterbuster
La tana del drago
Lo sviluppatore Red Tiger ci ha da sempre abituato a giochi molto divertenti e con una grafica impeccabile. Dobbiamo dire che anche con Dragons Clusterbuster le nostre speranze non sono state disattese. Come intuibile dal titolo, la slot ha come tema i draghi, maestose creature mitologiche dotate di ali e capaci di sputare fuoco dalla bocca.
I colori principali del gioco sono l’oro, l’argento e il rame, ma anche il blu e il verde seppur in tono minore. Ai lati della griglia c’è la pelle squamosa del drago, per il momento unico riferimento al tema del gioco.
In alto ci sono tre tondi con un lucchetto disegnato al centro della griglia si trova un uovo, che svolgerà una delle funzioni principali del gioco.
Meccanismo a grappolo
In questa slot la meccanica di gioco a grappolo: ogni volta che atterra un cluster di almeno cinque simboli identici adiacenti si ottiene una combinazione vincente. Il sistema è a cascata, quindi i simboli vincenti scompaiono e vengono rimpiazzati da simboli del tutto nuovi che possono generare nuove combo paganti. A ogni giro atterrano quindi 72 simboli. La griglia di gioco ha forma quadrata, con nove rulli e nove righe. La scommessa minima è di 0,20 €, ma si può alzare a piacimento. Tra le funzioni principali c’è l’Autoplay e il Turbo, che permette di accelerare la caduta dei simboli.
La volatilità è alta, per cui non si vince spesso ma i premi sono sostanziosi.
L’occhio del drago
Oltre alle carte da gioco, che sono i simboli che pagano meno, troviamo la pergamena, le spade, la sfera con la croce e la corona. Il simbolo Wild sostituisce tutti i simboli e può comparire in ogni posizione della griglia.
Al centro della griglia è presente un quadrato 3×3 con all’interno un uovo. Ogni qualvolta con un unico Spin vengono rimossi i simboli intorno all’uovo, i contorni si illuminano. Rimuovendo tutti gli otto simboli, nell’uovo apparirà un occhio e verrà sbloccata la funziona corrispondente. La prima è l’occhio azzurro. In questo caso i simboli di basso valore vengono rimossi, generando un effetto a cascata che può produrre vincite più alte.
Rimuovendo le successive otto tessere al centro, si sblocca la seconda funzione. L’occhio del drago è ora verde e in modo casuale vedremo numerosi Wild sostituire diversi simboli base.
La terza funzione è legata all’occhio viola. In questo caso dei fulmini colpiranno un numero casuale di simboli trasformandoli in moltiplicatori.
L’ultima funzione è quella dei Free Spins. Sbloccando otto tessere intorno all’uovo riceveremo in omaggio dieci giri gratuiti.






Domande Frequenti 
Cosa vuol dire sistema a cascata?

Significa che ogni volta che otteniamo una combinazione vincente, i simboli paganti vengono rimossi e sostituiti da altri nuovo, che possono generare ulteriori combo.



A quanto corrisponde il ritorno teorico al giocatore di Dragons Clusterbuster?

Il valore RTP è del 96%, nella media della maggior parte dei giochi di slot!



Posso giocare a Dragons Clusterbuster anche sullo smartphone?

Certo, Dragons Clusterbuster è disponibile per ogni device!
name: Dragons Clusterbuster

message.content:
Dragons Clusterbuster
Dragon's den
Developer Red Tiger has always provided us with very fun games with impeccable graphics. We must say that with Dragons Clusterbuster, our hopes have not been disappointed. As can be guessed from the title, the slot machine has dragons as its theme, majestic mythical creatures with wings and the ability to breathe fire from their mouths.
The main colors of the game are gold, silver and copper, but also blue and green, albeit in a minor tone. At the sides of the grid, there is the scaly skin of the dragon, for now the only reference to the game's theme.
At the top, there are three circles with a lock drawn in the center of the grid. In the middle, there is an egg, which will perform one of the main functions of the game.
Cluster mechanism
In this slot machine, the game mechanics are cluster-based: every time a cluster of at least five identical adjacent symbols lands, a winning combination is obtained. The system is cascading, so the winning symbols disappear and are replaced by completely new ones that can generate new paying combinations. Therefore, 72 symbols land on each spin. The game grid is square, with nine reels and nine rows. The minimum bet is € 0.20, but it can be raised at will. Among the main functions, there are Autoplay and Turbo, which speeds up the falling of the symbols.
The volatility is high, so you can't win often, but the prizes are substantial.
The dragon's eye
In addition to the playing cards, which are the symbols that pay the least, we find the parchment, the swords, the sphere with the cross, and the crown. The Wild symbol replaces all symbols and can appear in any position on the grid.
In the middle of the grid, there is a 3x3 square with an egg inside. Whenever the symbols around the egg are removed with a single spin, the outlines light up. By removing all eight symbols, an eye will appear in the egg, and the corresponding function will be unlocked. The first is the blue eye, in which low-value symbols are removed, generating a cascading effect that can produce higher wins.
By removing the next eight tiles from the center, the second function is unlocked. Now, the dragon's eye is green, and we will randomly see many Wilds replace different base symbols.
The third function is related to the purple eye. In this case, lightning strikes a random number of symbols transforming them into multipliers.
The last function is that of Free Spins. By unlocking eight tiles around the egg, we will receive ten free spins as a gift.



FAQs
What does cascading system mean?

It means that every time we get a winning combination, the paying symbols are removed and replaced by new ones, which can generate further combos.



What is the theoretical return to player of Dragons Clusterbuster?

The RTP value is 96%, in line with most slot games!



Can I play Dragons Clusterbuster on my smartphone?

Sure, Dragons Clusterbuster is available on every device!

rewritten_review_text:
Game Description

Dragons Clusterbuster is a slot game developed by Red Tiger. The game theme revolves around dragons with the main colors being gold, silver, and copper, with blue and green in the background. The game comprises a 9x9 grid with a cluster-based mechanism and cascading reels.

Game Mechanics

Dragons Clusterbuster game mechanics are cluster-based. The slot machine payouts are awarded when five or more identical symbols land adjacent to each other. Every win generates a cascade that removes winning symbols and replaces them with new ones to generate more paying combinations. 72 symbols land each spin on the 9x9 grid. The minimum bet is € 0.20, and the game has Autoplay and Turbo functions to speed up falling symbols.

Symbols and Wilds

The slot game Symbols in Dragons Clusterbuster include playing cards, namely Ace, King, Queen, Jack, and Nine. The game also features symbols like parchment, swords, sphere with cross, and crown, where playing cards have the least payout value. The Wild symbol, represented by dragon eyes, substitutes every other symbol and can appear anywhere on the grid.

Dragon's Eye Features

Dragons Clusterbuster features many dragon eye functions that unlock various bonuses. In the center of the gaming grid lays a 3x3 square with an egg inside. The game has four functions, and each function unlocks after removing eight tiles around the egg. The blue eye removes low-paying symbols generating cascading effects that can produce higher wins. The next eight tiles reveal the green dragon's eye that replaces base symbols with random Wilds. The purple dragon's eye transforms random symbols to multipliers, while the last function awards players ten free spins.

Volatility

This slot machine has high volatility, meaning that slot game players may not win regularly. However, the payouts are substantial.

Minimum Bet

The minimum bet for Dragons Clusterbuster slot game is € 0.20 with an opportunity to raise the bet.

Autoplay and Turbo

Dragons Clusterbuster comes equipped with Autoplay and Turbo features to hasten the falling of symbols.

Free Spins

The fourth function of the Dragon's Eye is free spins that unlock after removing eight tiles around the egg. Players get ten free spins as a gift.

Graphics

Dragons Clusterbuster has stunning graphics that are a favorite feature in all of Red Tiger's games. The game's theme inspired the color design with gold, silver, and copper dominating the reels, while blue and green complete the artwork subtly.

expanded_review.headline: Game Description
expanded_review.content:
Dragons Clusterbuster is a thrilling slot game developed by Red Tiger that is sure to captivate players with its unique features. The game is set in a fantastic world where dragons reign supreme, and the colors used capture the theme beautifully. The main colors are gold, silver, and copper, which complement the blue and green background perfectly.

The game mechanics consist of a 9x9 grid, making it slightly larger than the typical slot game setup. Rather than traditional paylines, the game uses a cluster-based mechanism. Players can form clusters of matching symbols on the grid to receive payouts. The cascading reels feature also adds an extra layer of excitement to the game. Whenever a cluster is formed, the symbols that make up the winning combination are removed, and new symbols cascade down from above to replace them, potentially creating new clusters.

Overall, Dragons Clusterbuster is an engaging game that is sure to keep players entertained for hours on end. The combination of the unique grid setup, cluster mechanism, and cascading reels makes for an exciting and immersive gaming experience that is not to be missed.

expanded_review.headline: Game Mechanics
expanded_review.content:
Dragons Clusterbuster is a vibrant and exciting online slot game that incorporates a unique cluster-based mechanic. The game is visually appealing, with stunning graphics and animations that bring the game to life. The slot machine payouts are awarded when five or more identical symbols land adjacent to each other.

Additionally, every win generates a cascade that removes winning symbols and replaces them with new ones to generate more paying combinations. With 72 symbols landing each spin on the 9x9 grid, players can potentially unlock some significant rewards.

The minimum bet in Dragons Clusterbuster is € 0.20, making it accessible to all types of players. The game also features Autoplay and Turbo functions to speed up falling symbols, providing an immersive and engaging gaming experience that keeps players coming back for more.

expanded_review.headline: Symbols and Wilds
expanded_review.content:
The slot game Symbols in Dragons Clusterbuster include playing cards, namely Ace, King, Queen, Jack, and Nine. The game also features symbols like parchment, swords, sphere with cross, and crown, where playing cards have the least payout value. These symbols are beautifully designed, and the graphics are impeccable. Players will undoubtedly relish spinning the reels, thanks to the high-quality graphics and sound effects.

The Wild symbol, represented by dragon eyes, substitutes every other symbol and can appear anywhere on the grid. This is fantastic news for players, as they can now complete a winning payline that would have been near-impossible. However, the Wilds do not have any payout value. Therefore, players need to land them more frequently to leverage their power.

expanded_review.headline: Dragon's Eye Features
expanded_review.content:
Dragons Clusterbuster is packed with exciting gameplay features, particularly the Dragon's Eye functions that unlock a range of bonuses. Positioned at the center of the gameboard is a 3x3 square with a mysterious egg nestled inside. The game features four different Dragon's Eye functions, which are unlocked as players remove eight tiles that surround the egg.

With the blue eye, players can remove low-paying symbols, leading to cascading effects that create higher wins. The green dragon's eye, which is the next function to unlock, turns base symbols into random Wilds. The purple dragon's eye can transform symbols into multipliers, providing players with even more ways to win. Finally, unlocking all eight tiles around the egg reveals the last function, which awards players with ten free spins to play with. These Dragon's Eye functions add an extra element of excitement to Dragons Clusterbuster, giving players a chance to boost their winnings while enjoying the game's stunning visuals and engaging gameplay.

expanded_review.headline: High Volatility in Dragons Clusterbuster
expanded_review.content:
If you're a fan of high-risk, high-reward slot games, then Dragons Clusterbuster might be the perfect game for you. This slot game boasts high volatility, which means that you may experience long periods of not winning, but when you do, the payouts can be substantial.

This high volatility is due to the fact that Dragons Clusterbuster features cluster pays instead of traditional paylines. This means that you don't need to worry about matching symbols on specific paylines; instead, you just need clusters of symbols to land adjacent to each other. While this approach can lead to more frequent wins, it can also make it difficult to hit those winning combinations.

Overall, if you're looking for a slot game that offers big payouts and high risk, then Dragons Clusterbuster is worth checking out. With the potential for big wins and exciting gameplay, this game is perfect for those who enjoy the thrill of gambling and are willing to take a few risks to come out on top.

expanded_review.headline: Minimum Bet
expanded_review.content:
When it comes to online slot games, it's important to know the minimum bet before you start playing. For Dragons Clusterbuster, the minimum bet is € 0.20. This is a reasonable amount that allows players on a budget to participate, while still having the chance to win big. However, it's important to note that players do have the opportunity to raise the bet if they choose to do so.

Overall, the minimum bet for Dragons Clusterbuster is affordably low and offers players the chance to enjoy all of the excitement and thrills of the game without breaking the bank. So, whether you're new to online slots or an experienced player, be sure to give this game a spin and see what fortunes await.

expanded_review.headline: Autoplay and Turbo
expanded_review.content:
Get ready for a fast-paced, high-energy slot game experience with Dragons Clusterbuster. The game offers two exciting features – Autoplay and Turbo – to add more excitement to the gameplay. With Autoplay, you can set the game to spin the reels automatically for a predetermined number of spins, allowing you to sit back and watch as the game unfolds.

The Turbo feature is perfect for players who are short on time or just want to speed up the game. With Turbo, the symbols drop much faster, making for a more rapid gaming experience. This feature is especially handy when you want to get in some quick spins before heading out or moving on to another game.

Whether you're a seasoned player or new to online slot games, Dragons Clusterbuster's Autoplay and Turbo features add an additional layer of excitement to an already thrilling game. Try it out and see how they enhance your gaming experience!

expanded_review.headline: Unlock Free Spins with the Dragon's Eye
expanded_review.content:
One of the most exciting features of Dragons Clusterbuster is the Dragon's Eye function, which offers free spins to lucky players. In order to unlock this function, players must remove eight tiles around the dragon egg on the game board. This task may seem daunting, but the payoff is definitely worth it, as players are gifted with ten free spins to enjoy on the reels.

During these free spins, players can potentially increase their winnings without wagering any of their own funds. This not only adds to the entertainment value of the game, but can also boost players' overall payouts, making Dragons Clusterbuster a popular choice among online slot enthusiasts.

Be sure to pay close attention to the Dragon's Eye function when playing Dragons Clusterbuster, as it can offer a lucrative and exciting bonus for fortunate individuals. With the potential for free spins and increased payouts, this feature adds an extra level of excitement to an already engrossing game.

expanded_review.headline: Graphics
expanded_review.content:
Dragons Clusterbuster features some of the most stunning graphics found in any online slot game. This is a recurring highlight in all of Red Tiger's games, and it's great to see that this game lives up to expectations. The exceptional visuals stand out, and the result is a truly immersive experience for players.

The game's theme has inspired the inclusion of gold, silver, and copper, which dominate the reels. These colors combined with the subtle blue and green artwork create a visually appealing environment. The attention to detail of each symbol on the reels is a credit to the game's designers and developers, as they have been able to create a game with beautiful graphics that fully immerse the player into the dragon-themed world.

The combination of colors and design in Dragons Clusterbuster creates an atmosphere that is perfect for players who are drawn to visually stunning games. The game's graphics are sure to leave a lasting impression on players, and they are a testament to the dedication and skill of the game developers who created it.

html:
Play Dragons Clusterbuster for free - Review & Guide

Meta description: Looking to play Dragons Clusterbuster? Read our review for a breakdown of what to expect in this Red Tiger slot game. Find out how to play for free!

Game Description

Dragons Clusterbuster is a thrilling slot game developed by Red Tiger that is sure to captivate players with its unique features. The game is set in a fantastic world where dragons reign supreme, and the colors used capture the theme beautifully. The main colors are gold, silver, and copper, which complement the blue and green background perfectly.

The game mechanics consist of a 9x9 grid, making it slightly larger than the typical slot game setup. Rather than traditional paylines, the game uses a cluster-based mechanism. Players can form clusters of matching symbols on the grid to receive payouts. The cascading reels feature also adds an extra layer of excitement to the game. Whenever a cluster is formed, the symbols that make up the winning combination are removed, and new symbols cascade down from above to replace them, potentially creating new clusters.

Overall, Dragons Clusterbuster is an engaging game that is sure to keep players entertained for hours on end. The combination of the unique grid setup, cluster mechanism, and cascading reels makes for an exciting and immersive gaming experience that is not to be missed.

Game Mechanics

Dragons Clusterbuster is a vibrant and exciting online slot game that incorporates a unique cluster-based mechanic. The game is visually appealing, with stunning graphics and animations that bring the game to life. The slot machine payouts are awarded when five or more identical symbols land adjacent to each other.

Additionally, every win generates a cascade that removes winning symbols and replaces them with new ones to generate more paying combinations. With 72 symbols landing each spin on the 9x9 grid, players can potentially unlock some significant rewards.

The minimum bet in Dragons Clusterbuster is € 0.20, making it accessible to all types of players. The game also features Autoplay and Turbo functions to speed up falling symbols, providing an immersive and engaging gaming experience that keeps players coming back for more.

Symbols and Wilds

The slot game Symbols in Dragons Clusterbuster include playing cards, namely Ace, King, Queen, Jack, and Nine. The game also features symbols like parchment, swords, sphere with cross, and crown, where playing cards have the least payout value. These symbols are beautifully designed, and the graphics are impeccable. Players will undoubtedly relish spinning the reels, thanks to the high-quality graphics and sound effects.

The Wild symbol, represented by dragon eyes, substitutes every other symbol and can appear anywhere on the grid. This is fantastic news for players, as they can now complete a winning payline that would have been near-impossible. However, the Wilds do not have any payout value. Therefore, players need to land them more frequently to leverage their power.

Dragon's Eye Features

Dragons Clusterbuster is packed with exciting gameplay features, particularly the Dragon's Eye functions that unlock a range of bonuses. Positioned at the center of the gameboard is a 3x3 square with a mysterious egg nestled inside. The game features four different Dragon's Eye functions, which are unlocked as players remove eight tiles that surround the egg.

With the blue eye, players can remove low-paying symbols, leading to cascading effects that create higher wins. The green dragon's eye, which is the next function to unlock, turns base symbols into random Wilds.
